entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog at times overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
